page.title: 10Halstead C.P. School Kent
page.content: Our school is{seventy five years {old.}We have infants and juniors in brick buildings. The infants building is old, the juniors have a modern building with a library and a big hall.The canteen cooks are the people who cook dinners, and the dinner ladies look after us when it is dinner play. In summer we play in our big field and in winter we play on the playground. We have a small{nature {area, a pond and a nature trail {nearby. There are{four classes,}there used to be seven but there are not so many children in the village now. We have a play school attached to the infants building and a P.T.A. which buys things for the school. { These pages were written by Halstead {C.P. School during Summer Term 1985.
